contentfulSermon.title: Backstage Pass to Christmas: Week 2 - The Purpose of Christmas

image.title: Backstage Pass to Christmas Sermon Series

fields.notesFormatted:
Matthew 1:18-25

  1. The result of Christmas is a relationship with God, based on forgiveness and freedom.
  2. Have I accepted Christmas?
  3. Does Christmas change the way I live the rest of the year?
  4. Christmas always leaves us with a decision to make.
